summary: Never-before-aired NASA footage presents evidence that the Moon is being used as a base.
cast: Roger Leopardi|Amy Shira Teitel|Joshua P. Warren|Lee Speigel|Nick Redfern|Mike Bara|Danielle Y. Wyrick|Ron Collins|Don Ecker|Vito Saccheri|Edgar D. Mitchell|Allan Sturm|Buzz Aldrin|Ken Johnston|Donna Hare|John Brandenburg|Marc D'Antonio
director: Director: Robert Kiviat (as Robert C. Kiviat)
title: Aliens en la Luna
